Effect (JP): クリティカル率が15%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 15%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 15%.

Effect (JP): クリティカル率が18%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 18%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit Rate by 18%.

Effect (JP): PPの自然回復速度が20%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 20%.
Effect (Global): Increases Natural PP recovery by 20%.

Effect (JP): PPの自然回復速度が23%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Natural PP Recovery by 23%.
Effect (Global): Increases Natural PP recovery by 23%.

Effect (JP): PPが40%以上の時、与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% while PP is at 40% or above.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 3% while PP is at or above 40%.

Effect (JP): PPが40%以上の時、与ダメージが5%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 5% while PP is at 40% or above.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 5% while PP is at or above 40%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージが4%上昇し、抜刀時のみ被ダメージが8%増える。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 4% but take 8% more damage when weapon is drawn.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 4% but take 8% more damage while your weapon is drawn.

Effect (JP): 連続でジャストアタックに成功すると、最大で3%まで与ダメージが上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 2% when performing successive Just Attacks (up to 3%).
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 2% when performing successive Perfect Attacks. Maxes at 3%.

Effect (JP): 攻撃時のPP回復量が17%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 17%.
Effect (Global): Increases active PP recovery by 17%.

Effect (JP): 一定時間ごとにHPを40%回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 40% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 40% of your maximum HP every 40 seconds.

Effect (JP): 4秒ごとにPPを10回復する。
Effect (English): Restores 10 PP every 4 seconds.
Effect (Global): Restores 10 PP every 4 seconds.

Effect (JP): 被ダメージを7%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces damage taken by 7%.
Effect (Global): Reduces damage taken by 7%.

Effect (JP): クリティカル時の与ダメージが3%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Critical Hit damage by 3%.
Effect (Global): Increases Critical Hit damage by 3%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージ450,000毎に30秒間、3%威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 3% for 30 seconds after inflicting 450,000 damage.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 3% for 30 seconds after inflicting 450,000 damage.

Effect (JP): 被ダメージ600毎に30秒間、毎秒HPが4%回復。
Effect (English): Recovers 4% max HP every second for 30 seconds after taking 600 damage.
Effect (Global): Recovers 4% max HP every second for 30 seconds after taking 600 damage.

Effect (JP): 発動時PP消費量150毎に30秒間、攻撃時のPP回復量が20%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP Recovery by 20% for 30 seconds after using 150 PP.
Effect (Global): Increases Active PP Recovery by 20% for 30 seconds after using 150 PP.

Effect (JP): ジャストガード成功時に20秒間、PP消費量を8%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 8% for 20 seconds after performing a Just Guard.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 8% for 20 seconds after performing a Perfect Guard.

Effect (JP): 被ダメージを8%軽減し怯まなくなるバリアが20秒間隔で発生・消滅。
Effect (English): Creates a barrier that reduces damage taken by 8% and nullifies knockback. The barrier will appear and disappear in 20 second intervals.
Effect (Global): Creates a barrier that reduces damage taken by 8% and nullifies knockback. The barrier will appear and disappear in 20 second intervals.

Effect (JP): 5秒間静止する毎に20秒間、PPの自然回復量が20%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases natural PP recovery by 20% for 20 seconds after standing still for 5 seconds.
Effect (Global): Increases natural PP recovery by 20% for 20 seconds after standing still for 5 seconds.

Effect (JP): 強敵への与ダメージが4%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage dealt to bosses by 4%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage dealt to bosses by 4%.

Effect (JP): 破壊可能な部位を攻撃した際、攻撃時PP回復量が40%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases Active PP recovery by 40% when attacking breakable parts.
Effect (Global): Increases Active PP recovery by 40% when attacking breakable parts.

Effect (JP): 納刀・抜刀を行う事でPP回復速度が変化。
Effect (English): Natural PP regeneration rate increased by 80% while weapon is sheathed. Natural PP regeneration rate reduced by 100% while weapon is unsheathed.
Effect (Global): Natural PP regeneration rate increased by 80% while weapon is sheathed. Natural PP regeneration rate reduced by 100% while weapon is unsheathed.

Effect (JP): 破壊可能な部位を攻撃した際、威力が4%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage against breakable parts by 4%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage against breakable parts by 4%.

Effect (JP): 自身のHP回復量が40%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases HP recovered from self-healing effects by 40%.
Effect (Global): Increases HP recovered from self-healing by 40%.

Effect (JP): 特殊能力の付与数に応じて威力上昇。最大で4%。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 0.5% for every Special Ability affixed to this weapon. Maxes at 4% for 8 Abilities.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 0.5% for every augment affixed to this weapon. Maxes at 4% for 8 augments.

Effect (JP): 特殊能力の付与数に応じて威力上昇。最大で6%。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 0.75% for every Special Ability affixed to this weapon. Maxes at 6% for 8 Abilities.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 0.75% for every augment affixed to this weapon. Maxes at 6% for 8 augments.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージが2%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 2%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 2%.

Effect (JP): 与ダメージが4%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 4%.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 4%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を7%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 7%.

Effect (JP): PP消費量を10%軽減。
Effect (English): Reduces PP consumption by 10%.
Effect (Global): Reduces PP consumption by 10%.

Effect (JP): 一定の範囲内でエネミーが死亡した時、PPが回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 3 PP when an enemy near you is defeated.
Effect (Global): Recovers 3 PP when a nearby enemy is defeated.

Effect (JP): 一定の範囲内でエネミーが死亡した時、PPが回復する。
Effect (English): Recovers 4 PP when an enemy near you is defeated.
Effect (Global): Recovers 4 PP when a nearby enemy is defeated.

Effect (JP): ガード系リングまたは武器属性が弱点属性と一致時、4%威力上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 4% when your weapon's element or equipped Guard Ring matches the enemy's elemental weakness.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 4% when your equipped Guard-type Ring or Weapon Element matches the enemy's Elemental Weakness.

Effect (JP): フォトンブラストゲージに応じて威力が上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage based on the Photon Blast Gauge. (1% at 0~3 bars, 2% at 4~7 bars, 3% at full charge)
Effect (Global): Increases damage based on the Photon Gauge. (1% at 0~3 bars, 2% at 4~7 bars, 3% at full charge)

Effect (JP): 特殊能力の追加打撃能力60毎に、威力1%上昇し200以上でさらに2%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 1% for every 60 S-ATK affixed to this weapon. Increases damage by an additional 2% if at least 200 S-ATK is affixed to this weapon.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 1% for every 60 MEL Pwr affixed to this weapon. Increases damage by an additional 2% if at least 200 MEL Pwr is affixed to this weapon.

Effect (JP): 特殊能力の追加射撃能力60毎に、威力1%上昇し200以上でさらに2%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 1% for every 60 R-ATK affixed to this weapon. Increases damage by an additional 2% if at least 200 R-ATK is affixed to this weapon.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 1% for every 60 RNG Pwr affixed to this weapon. Increases damage by an additional 2% if at least 200 RNG Pwr is affixed to this weapon.

Effect (JP): 特殊能力の追加法撃能力60毎に、威力1%上昇し200以上でさらに2%上昇。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 1% for every 60 T-ATK affixed to this weapon. Increases damage by an additional 2% if at least 200 T-ATK is affixed to this weapon.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 1% for every 60 TEC Pwr affixed to this weapon. Increases damage by an additional 2% if at least 200 TEC Pwr is affixed to this weapon.

Effect (JP): 1秒毎に与ダメージが上昇。最大で4%。
Effect (English): Increases damage every second to a maximum of 4% after 30 seconds.
Effect (Global): Increases damage every second to a maximum of 4% after 30 seconds.

Effect (JP): 20秒毎に最大HPの5%ダメージを負う代わりに威力が4%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases damage by 4% but reduces HP by 5% of max HP every 20 seconds.
Effect (Global): Increases damage by 4% but reduces HP by 5% of max HP every 20 seconds.

Effect (JP):
被ダメージ回数に応じて3段階の威力上昇。
最大段階の被ダメージ時 周囲ダメージが発生し自身のHPが1になる。
Effect (English):
Increases damage every time you take damage as follows:
1% increase on 3rd hit
3% increase on 6th hit
10% increase on 9th hit
Upon receiving a 10th hit, an explosion will be released that reduces your HP to 1, massively damages all nearby targets and resets the effect of this skill.
Effect (Global):
Increases damage every time you take damage as follows:
1% increase on 3rd hit
3% increase on 6th hit
10% increase on 9th hit
Upon receiving a 10th hit, an explosion will be released that reduces your HP to 1, massively damages all nearby targets and resets the effect of this skill.

Effect (JP): 命中時に25%の確率でジェルンを付与。
Effect (English): Grant a 25% chance to inflict the Jellen status when attacking an enemy.
Effect (Global): Attacking an enemy grants a 25% chance to inflict the target with the Jellen status effect.

Effect (JP): PP消費量が8%増加する代わりにPAとテクニックの威力が4%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases PP consumption by 8% in exchange for 4% more damage when using PAs and Techniques.
Effect (Global): Increases PP consumption by 8% in exchange for 4% more damage when using PAs and Techniques.

Effect (JP): PP消費量が4%増加する代わりにPAとテクニックの威力が6%上昇する。
Effect (English): Increases PP consumption by 4% in exchange for 6% more damage when using PAs and Techniques.
Effect (Global): Increases PP consumption by 4% in exchange for 6% more damage when using PAs and Techniques.
